text: Allahanannu bhetiyagalikkide embudannu nirakarisidavaru bhari nastadalliruvaru. Antima ghaligeyu hathattane avara mele banderagidaga avaru ‘‘ayyo nam'ma dusthiti! Navu idannu kadeganisiddevu’’ ennuvaru. Andu avaru tam'ma benna mele tam'ma (papagala) bharavannu hottukondiruvaru. Tilidirali! Tira kettadu, avara a hore
